version_description:
What's New
1. Alliance Treasure: a new Alliance based function which can be entered via the Warehouse and is open to players whose Castles have reached Lv.6;
2. Sacrificial Lamb event: during this event, players can place Sacrificial Lambs on the Ki

What's New
1. Alliance Treasure: a new Alliance based function which can be entered via the Warehouse and is open to players whose Castles have reached Lv.6;
2. Sacrificial Lamb event: during this event, players can place Sacrificial Lambs on the Ki

1. New Pet System:
Tame and feed pets. Send them to patrol territories to earn rich rewards.

2. New Lancer Hero - Selim:

Increases lancer attack. There's a chance to deal trample damage to an enemy troop within an attack range of 1-4.
